name: floqast-staff-qa-assessment
description: Staff Quality Engineer take-home assessment for FloQast

scripts.serve: npm run test:api:with-server && npm run test:ui:with-server && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:api:with-server: kill -9 $(lsof -ti :3001) 2>/dev/null || true && ts-node src/mocks/mockApiServer.ts & SERVER_PID=$! && sleep 2 && npm run test:api; kill $SERVER_PID
scripts.test:ui:with-server: kill -9 $(lsof -ti :3002) 2>/dev/null || true && ts-node src/mocks/uiServer.ts & SERVER_PID=$! && sleep 2 && npm run test:ui; kill $SERVER_PID
scripts.test:all:report: npm run test:all && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
